body.name: Cora Organic Applicator Tampon Multipack | 36 Super & 36 Super Plus Absorbency | 100% Organic Cotton, Unscented, Plant-Based Compact Applicator | Leak Protection | 72 Count
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 15% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
features: NEW & IMPROVED: The best-selling organic cotton tampon on Amazon, now even better than ever! Made from 100% organic cotton with a new plant-based applicator and an updated design that expands widthwise for ultra confident leak protection. Packaging may vary.

100% ORGANIC COTTON: Tampons made from 100% certified organic cotton – because what you put in your body matters. Made without pesticides, dioxins, rayon, or chlorine; free of fragrance and dyes. FSA/HSA Eligible.
NEW PLANT-BASED APPLICATOR: Sleek, plant-based* compact applicator made from renewable resources for smooth, comfortable insertion. *minimum 92% plant-based plastic

EXPANDS AND PROTECTS: Gently expands to absorb from all angles for a worry-free, comfortable fit and ultra reliable leak protection –so you can roll with your flow. All absorbencies available for light to heavy flows: Light, Regular, Super, Super Plus, and Variety Packs.

EVERY BODY DESERVES COMFORT: We believe everyone should have access to period care–full stop. So, with each Cora purchase, we provide period products and body literacy resources to people who might otherwise go without.
100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: If you are not 100% delighted by our goods, reach out to us and we’ll make it right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is 100 % cotton like it says and works. Just like the add says. Has more super then supper Pluss but still great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've used other organic brands but I like the CORA brand the best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I. Love. Cora. It’s. My. Favorite. They just work. And PLEASE, if you can afford it, switch to organic. And if you have a tight budget, let this be your first switch. Because my entire cycle is DIFFERENT since switching. Less PMS, less cramping, less aches, more predictable flow…. And these are my favorite organic because they actually absorb. And they’re well priced. I don’t love the rebranding but oh well. It’s still cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Greatly reduced cramps
reviews.reviewText: Ok so the reviews on these are mixed, but hear me out. I know the applicator isn’t perfect. But I’m here to tell you these have changed my life. I have very rough periods, and since I’ve switched from Tampax to these, my cramps are GREATLY reduced. They are MUCH better. They are tolerable now. I am a very busy person and student healthcare worker. I ain’t got time for this shit. Periods have taken so much from my life. These tampons have been a gift and I’m not going back to Tampax ever. Other organic tampons leak, but I have zero problem with these. Would give 6 stars if I could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I am pretty sure they don't hold the same amount as my tampax, but I've found if I size up (ie when I normally need a Super Tampax, I use Super Plus here) it works well. I've only used them for one cycle so far, but I've found them far more comfortable and the fact that they are organic is worth it to me as I have been getting a lot of irritation from the non-organic products. After caring for someone with cervical cancer, I've been taking this issue way more seriously. The cardboard applicator on the S and S+ sizes are not as easy to use as the plastic on the Reg, but in my opinion its not that big of a deal, just something to get used to. Will continue to use these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My wife and daughter love these..
reviews.reviewText: My wife and daughter are a pair. I never knew that my wife and daughter could teach me so much about how they can never find a tampon that works and is fully functional. They love them. Absolutely love them, and may live on them as many as I buy. Not sure. To whoever makes these, great work, makes my life much more peaceful, and you can’t put a price on that..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much better
reviews.reviewText: I love these. Notice a difference in my cycle for the better with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best tampons I've ever used
reviews.reviewText: I never write reviews but thought I would share my experience with using Cora tampons. I originally found them at Target but with very limited selection, so I am really happy to know I can get the sizes and options I need, all with prime shipping! I purchased a combo box of super+/super, and honestly after the first Cora tampon I used, I didn't want to use any other brands! I am very sensitive to pretty much everything, and I could tell the difference immediately between Cora and other popular brands that I have used my entire life. After using only Cora for the past several months, I can honestly say my cramping and period pain has decreased, and I think it is due to the fact that there are no chemicals in these tampons and the cotton is organic. I had to use a different brand recently when I found myself out & about without supplies, and I seriously could feel my insides cramping from the toxins. I could always "feel" tampons before, but I thought that's just part of being a woman and having your cycle and wearing tampons. Not with Cora. I can't "feel" them at all. They are the best natural, chemical and toxin free tampon I have found!! And I have tried literally all of them! Seriously try them, you will not regret it.
